verse.gurmukhi: Aibkwr rUp AnBY sdw mun jn gn bMdq crn ]

en.bdb: He is and Entity without vices, always Fearless, the assemblies of sages and men bow at His Feet.

en.bdb: He pervades the world, removes the sufferings and blemishes, Supremely Glorious and effacer of illusions and fears.2.33.
